level.heading: Appointments to vacancies.
level.text: When a vacancy develops on the Commission, the Mayor shall appoint a successor, with the advice and consent of the Council, to complete the unexpired term.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-88
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-88, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1324.
